topic.title: Some questions about Bitcoin 关于比特币的疑问
topic.body:
平时经常听说比特币，但是自己还没有亲自使用过比特币，因此有一些问题需要请教高手：
1)到底如何使用比特币？Windows 系统的电脑需要下载什么软件？
2) 网络上有一些人说，比特币有一些缺陷，效率低：
全互联网每秒钟可以认可的比特币交易只有7笔，炒币火热的那一阵子，真正完成一笔支付需要大约一周时间！！ 
既然操作环节需要经过很多节点的确认，请问操作过程中，需要注意哪些事项？

这是网页上，别人整理的信息：
https://www.zhihu.com/question/267451495/answer/673212385 
问题是，比特币在设计时由于技术架构没设计好，所以每秒钟只能完成7笔交易－－你没看错，全互联网每秒钟可以认可的比特币交易只有7笔。结果就是，炒币火热的那一阵子，真正完成一笔支付需要大约一周时间。

topic.title: Statistics on Coronavirus   ...
topic.body:
The video about Coronavirus Cases Statistics
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Abv34uC9VJc  
Top 20 Country by Total Coronavirus Cases (January to August)

Excel Sheet can sort the data, and display it in a static way.  
However, the table in the video can show **dynamic changes in the comparison**. 
So I'm wondering: 
what software is used to do the dynamic comparison in the statistics as shown in the video? 

I'm quite familiar with Excel Data operation. However, the dynamic way of comparison may be not done by excel. 
It'd be done by a special software? 

Anyone familiar with the statistics niche?  
Please help take a look.

topic.title: About Data Blockade on Zeronet
topic.body:
A question here, about P2P Peer-to-Peer data transfer. 
When a new topic or comment is posted, a message prompt may appear, such as "successfully posted to 5 peers". 
So the data are transmitted to all the 5 peers at the same time, or one by one? 

[About Data Blockade on Zeronet … ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HMLvnRWViMnuvZc5LK4Dm86sZNcSH1jdh/?Topic:1632390081_1GmnzXHeSi3UXLhbdL92ps2CExH6u46Uyf/About+Data+Blockade+on+Zeronet)

Some abnormal phenomena may be caused by the GFW data blockade that invades Zeronet now. 

For example, the below topic was posted by an associate around 2:00 o’clock of Sep 23rd (East Asia time zone like Hong Kong). 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1632333142_1MieUGUUVUxVmvuLNGcTXt9wVBSqpeztDT  

A comment by other netizen was posted one hour later (about 3:00 o'clock of Sep 23rd Hong Kong time)
"Posts don't show on that site. Share the text here." 

But the display of this comment was delayed many hours later.  It was only displayed in the afternoon (about 16:00 o'clock ) Hong Kong time.  

However, data flow can be quicker on other forums. 
The Chinese forum NewGFWTalk.bit has been seriously eroded by eunuch virus of fifty-cent party sent by the CCP.  
Data flow on that forum is not seriously blocked by the GFW. Normally update of messages will be synchronized across different equipments in a few minutes, upon the post of some new comments or topics (occasionally longer latency may be involved, but most of the time synchronization finished in less than one hour). 

Occasionally there may be some furious Chinese messages such as 
Overthrow the CCP 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit/?Topic:12_13XxUnL4WgmyNhfmUqtVVfe15hyrV4qDpe/ 
but since there’re not many details that can inspire people to fight in a better way, such forum will not be taken as dangerous against the Atheism Jungle Dictatorship. 

##Some unconventional features with the Unlimit Talk forum 
 are that sensitive topics related to crimes exposure can go freely, without the trouble of the [50 K limit ! ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1H1DB7PXNUNo8LNLYZZZKd5qaRadLg8Uzk/?Topic:1624003018_1KjezDT16Z47VxZasHVX4LLTb91h94FKXg/50+K+limit+to+be+avoided)
. 

By comparison of the above phenomena, does it mean that GFW data maneuver has been upgraded to an extreme level?  They can produce big obstacles against the data flow, even in the decentralized web?  Though it won’t totally paralyze Zeronet, but very long latency may be incurred with the data flow? 

[Data Space to go for long ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HMLvnRWViMnuvZc5LK4Dm86sZNcSH1jdh/?Topic:1630995388_1MieUGUUVUxVmvuLNGcTXt9wVBSqpeztDT/Data+Space+to+go+for+a+whole+life)
[50 K limit to be avoided! & code to enhance Browsing … ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zybbs.bit/?Topic:6_1PUkWFbzkD4dyRZ2vH3G8WeQw4m2UVPA2p/a+Special+code+related+to+trackers)

1532139527_15PkTh9DC2wPmrGrQoYVQ6xJLobda.body:
这是高手的帖子，要顶起来。
我是新手，正在学习中。请教一个问题哦，
COPY TO CLIPBOARD 复制后得到的peers节点信息
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/?zeronet_peers= ........ 

对于这个节点信息的文本文件，需要把它复制到某个文件夹下面吗？
还是把这些节点信息放到其它地方？

不好意思，因为是新手，所以碰到一些问题时，有点迷茫。请高手有空时，耐心一点予以更多细节层面的指导。谢谢哦。

ctrl+V粘贴后，得到的peers节点信息
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/?zeronet_peers= ........

对于这个节点信息的文本文件，需要把它复制到某个文件夹下面吗？
还是把这些节点信息放到其它地方？

不好意思，因为是新手，所以碰到一些问题时，有点迷茫。请高手有空时，耐心一点予以更多细节层面的指导。谢谢哦。

ICQ群组上面有一些墙内的网友们也在探讨，可能由于零网的信息难以删贴，近期封锁的力量增强了。

有网友用新电脑，去下载最新的ZeroNet 0.6.3版本。甚至连默认的首页
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D    
都无法打开，会出现 
 Trackers Announcing Error 

（这个错误提示的截图，传到了图文站点，链接：
http://127.0.0.1:43110/168x9d56MSBjrq6TYoDaSvxXSux3nPzw37/?Topic:2_1GmnzXHeSi3UXLhbdL92ps2CExH6u46Uyf/Trackers+Announcing+Error  

请其他网友帮忙看看，是什么问题？）

http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/  
等其它站点自然也打不开。

但是，改用老电脑，因为以前有下载过那些站点，有做过种，那些站点仍然可以打开，但是没有做过种的新站点，无法打开。

这么奇怪的问题，说明正邪双方的数据节点战争已经达到极致，对于那些以前有做过种的站点，是无法封锁的。但是对于没有做过种的新站点（或者说data资料里没有下载过的站点），会遇到新问题。希望高手们有空时继续研究。

碰到这么奇怪的问题，令人感慨之余，同时也**祝福那些为丛林暴政效力的黑客们，希望他们中的某些人不会像马航空难的高级特工那样，去大海里喂鱼，还死得糊里糊涂，甚至连如何被灭口的信息都遭到封锁，让他们的亲人、朋友、同胞们都无法知晓！**

> [kai0](#comment_641_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): 新安装客户端没有节点，自己做一个tracker文件。
制作tracker文件，有没相关的细节，文章链接在哪里？

看到了，这个链接
http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit/?Topic:1_1FwsMAWJuDNjhQc2bQLBWXWNRYSUuUcQJo 
也有人在探讨。在进一步学习中，稍后再请教。

1600215261_1GmnzXHeSi3UXLhbdL92ps2CExH6u.body:
Certainly the actual number should be much higher than the reported figures, especially in East Asia (China is always false with the statistics).  The top one should be always China, then followed by the USA, and other countries. 
What is more interesting is the special way those statics figures are displayed, in a dynamic way to show the comparison between different countries, changing with the date going by … 
That dynamic way should be done by a special software? 
What is the software? 
I'd like to learn more about it.
